La Mejor Manera de Empezar a Construir R: The Best Way to Start Building Wealth
Genera ingresos de la forma más fácil: Generate income in the easiest way
Tú inviertes y nosotros nos encargamos d: You invest and we take care of managing your money
Empieza a invertir poco a poco y tu dine: Start investing little by little and your money will start to grow
Elige en qué quieres invertir y qué tant: Choose what you want to invest in and how much risk you are willing to take
Aprende sobre cómo invertir tu dinero: Learn about how to invest your money
Aprende qué hacen y cómo los hacen los m: Learn what the best in the industry do and how they do it
No importa si tienes poco dinero para in: It doesn't matter if you have little money to invest...
home.quesehace: At Invictum, we are eliminating traditional barriers to the world of investments. We provide the middle class and young adults the opportunity to access professional wealth building and management services through our digital platform.
home.historia.contenido: Invictum was founded with the vision of making investment opportunities available to everyone, regardless of their social status or age. We believe in the power of technology to transform the investment industry and that belief is what drives us every day.
home.vision.contenido: Our vision is to become the world's leading venture capital firm. We want to empower people to invest in their future and make their dreams come true.
confirmacionDeposito.mensaje: Your deposit has been  successfully processed.
depositar.error.amount: The amount is required and it must be a number.
depositar.error.cardnumber: The card number is required and it must be a number of 16 digits.
depositar.error.csv: The CSV is required and it must be a number of 3 digits.
retirar.error.account: Account id is invalid. It should have 16 digits.
retirar.confirmacion.mensaje: Your withdrawal has been successfully processed.
acordeon.titulo: What do you want to learn today?
